text: Zathi (iziThunywa) zona: “Hini na (Lût)! Inene, thina siziziThunywa ezivela eNkosini yakho! Abayi kufikelela kuwe! Ke kaloku wena hamba nosapho lwakho kwisahlulo sobusuku, kungabikho namnye kuni unyeka ngasemva; ngaphandle komfazi wakho, inene, isohlwayo esiza kuthwaxa bona siza kuthwaxa yena, inene, ekuseni iya kuba lixesha labo elimisiweyo. Ayikho kufuphi na intsasa?”
